text: Stanisław Mikulski (1 May 1929 – 27 November 2014) was a Polish theatre, television, movie actor. He was a host of the Polish game show Wheel of Fortune (Koło Fortuny). Mikulski was known for starring in the leading role in the 1967-1968 television series Stawka większa niż życie. Mikulski died in Warsaw, Poland, aged 85.Stanisław Mikulski nie żyje.
